description:
Shinpei visits Karikiri, the head priest, who looks exactly the same age as he does seventy years ago in a photo. Shinpei asks him if Karikiri was the first director of Hishigata Clinic: Shidehiko Hishigata, or Shide himself. Learning more of Shide`s unforgivable deed, Shinpei burns with vengeance and notices something odd about Karikiri`s appearance.
Source: Disney+
